recipe.title: Java Chip Caffeinated Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; coffee, brewed, cooled ; (360 mL)
⅓ cup ; chocolate chips, plus more, crushed for topping ; (60 g)

steps.step: Pour the coffee into an ice cube tray. Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
Add the coffee ice cubes, half and half, chocolate chips, sugar, and coffee beans to a blender. Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream and crushed chocolate chips.
